(ROOT
  (S
    (ADVP (RB Currently))
    (NP (PRP we))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (NP
        (NP (DT an) (JJ active) (NN group))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP
            (NP (NNS kakis))
            (SBAR
              (WHNP (WP who))
              (S
                (VP (VBP meet)
                  (S
                    (VP (TO to)
                      (VP (VB discuss)
                        (PP (IN about)
                          (NP
                            (NP (NN food))
                            (PP (IN in)
                              (NP (PRP$ our) (NN forum)))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


advmod(have-3, Currently-1)
nsubj(have-3, we-2)
root(ROOT-0, have-3)
det(group-6, an-4)
amod(group-6, active-5)
dobj(have-3, group-6)
prep(group-6, of-7)
pobj(of-7, kakis-8)
nsubj(meet-10, who-9)
rcmod(kakis-8, meet-10)
aux(discuss-12, to-11)
xcomp(meet-10, discuss-12)
prep(discuss-12, about-13)
pobj(about-13, food-14)
prep(food-14, in-15)
poss(forum-17, our-16)
pobj(in-15, forum-17)


(ROOT
  (S (CC But)
    (S
      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (VBP realize)
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP (RB not) (NN everyone))
            (VP (VBZ likes)
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB use)
                    (NP (DT the) (NN forum))))))))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP (PRP it))
      (VP (VBZ has)
        (NP
          (NP (PRP$ its) (NN limitation))
          (PP (IN in)
            (NP
              (NP (NNS terms))
              (PP (IN of)
                (S
                  (VP (VBG being)
                    (ADJP (JJ able)
                      (S
                        (VP (TO to)
                          (VP (VB alert)
                            (NP (NNS readers))
                            (PP (TO to)
                              (NP (DT the) (VBG upcoming) (NN makan) (NNS outings)))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


cc(realize-3, But-1)
nsubj(realize-3, I-2)
root(ROOT-0, realize-3)
mark(likes-7, that-4)
neg(everyone-6, not-5)
nsubj(likes-7, everyone-6)
ccomp(realize-3, likes-7)
aux(use-9, to-8)
xcomp(likes-7, use-9)
det(forum-11, the-10)
dobj(use-9, forum-11)
cc(realize-3, and-12)
nsubj(has-14, it-13)
conj(realize-3, has-14)
poss(limitation-16, its-15)
dobj(has-14, limitation-16)
prep(limitation-16, in-17)
pobj(in-17, terms-18)
prep(terms-18, of-19)
cop(able-21, being-20)
pcomp(of-19, able-21)
aux(alert-23, to-22)
xcomp(able-21, alert-23)
dobj(alert-23, readers-24)
prep(alert-23, to-25)
det(outings-29, the-26)
amod(outings-29, upcoming-27)
nn(outings-29, makan-28)
pobj(to-25, outings-29)


(ROOT
  (FRAG (RB So) (JJ ,)))


root(ROOT-0, So-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (ADVP (RB also))
      (VP (VBN updated)
        (NP (DT the) (JJ ieatshootipost) (NN facebook) (NN group))
        (PP (IN for)
          (NP
            (NP (DT those) (NNS readers))
            (SBAR
              (WHNP (WP who))
              (S
                (VP (VBP are)
                  (NP
                    (NP (NNS users))
                    (PP (IN of)
                      (NP (NN facebook)))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(updated-4, I-1)
aux(updated-4, have-2)
advmod(updated-4, also-3)
root(ROOT-0, updated-4)
det(group-8, the-5)
amod(group-8, ieatshootipost-6)
nn(group-8, facebook-7)
dobj(updated-4, group-8)
prep(updated-4, for-9)
det(readers-11, those-10)
pobj(for-9, readers-11)
nsubj(users-14, who-12)
cop(users-14, are-13)
rcmod(readers-11, users-14)
prep(users-14, of-15)
pobj(of-15, facebook-16)
